title: Cyber - Mitel security advisory (AV25-251)
description: On May 7, 2025, Mitel published security advisories to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Mitel 6800 Series SIP Phones  version R6.4.0.SP4 and prior
Mitel 6900 Series SIP Phones  version R6.4.0.SP4 and prior
Mitel 6900w Series SIP Phones  version R6.4.0.SP4 and prior
Mitel 6970 Conference Unit  version R6.4.0.SP4 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
